title: NOW
description: Returns the current Datetime based on the context user's local time zone.
examples:
NOW()
-- Returns the current date and time (e.g., 2023-07-07T02:00:55.564Z).

ADD_DAYS(NOW(), 3)
-- Returns the date and time 3 days after the current Datetime (e.g., 2023-07-10T02:00:55.564Z).

tips.text: Use TODAY function if you prefer a date-only value.
Use the ADD_DAYS function to add days to a Datetime.
